alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 28 at 7:22PM MST until July 28 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR BIG CHINO WASH IN YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 717 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated light rain continuing over the Big Chino Wash drainage west of Paulden. Heavy rain that fell earlier today will flow down Big Chino Wash toward Paulden this evening. Flows are not expected to leave the banks, but several feet of water will likely move through this wash and into the Verde River tonight. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Yavapai County This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Pine Creek, Partridge Creek, Quartz Lead Wash, Verde River, Williamson Valley Wash, Antelope Wash, Turkey Canyon, Walnut Creek, Mud Tank Wash and Big Chino Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
